subject: [YouTrack, Commented] Issue codio-6415: IE 11 problems with Units
text:
Bug was updated by VeronikaLee in project Codio at 29 Sep 2015 12:34.
 < https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6415 >codio-6415< https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6415 > IE 11 problems with Units Created by Ian Jobling                                                                        
a: a number of Students weren't getting flowchart blocks appearing for them to use in the What is a program unit                                                                                                                                          
The teacher commented that was a browser issue in IE11 and was ok in chrome,

html:
Bug was updated by VeronikaLee in project Codio at 29 Sep 2015 12:34.

codio-6415 IE 11 problems with Units Created by Ian Jobling
a: a number of Students weren't getting flowchart blocks appearing for them to use in the What is a program unit
The teacher commented that was a browser issue in IE11 and was ok in chrome,

b: was deleted and created new issue codio-6417
re https://app.intercom.io/a/apps/ee8711023afa04b80a6b921ddb3939c1171e0f62/inbox/ijobling@codio.com/conversations/1201253485
I got the same problem in Safary: not all but more then half times I didn't get flowchart blocks in this Unit
